SEARCH
Package Helpers.ServerHelpers

Class ClientInterface

java.lang.Object
Helpers.ServerHelpers.ClientInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientInterface extends Object implements Runnable
A ClientInterface is created on its own thread for every new client that joins the cafe, it performs a handshake with a Customer which is determined by the passed socket from Barista. After the handshake is successful it will continuously listen for and process incoming Message's

Also uses its socket to send messages back to the client.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientInterface

      public ClientInterface(Socket socket, Cafe cafe, int clientId)
      Creates a new ClientInterface.
      Parameters:
      socket - The socket for communicating with the client
      cafe - Link to the cafe to access the 3 production areas
      clientId - Id of the client on this connection, assigned from Barista

      Specified by:

    • performHandshake

      private void performHandshake()
      Request "NAME" from the client, read the response as the clients name and respond with a welcome message.

    • acknowledgeConnection

      private void acknowledgeConnection()
      Check that the client has acknowledged the connection by waiting for an "ACKNOWLEDGED" message from the client.

    • listenForIncomingClientMessages

      private void listenForIncomingClientMessages()
      Listen for incoming messages (Message) from the client while the connection is valid.

      Runs relevant code and responds with a relevant Message.

    • clientExited

      private void clientExited()

    • getNumberOfDrinksByDrinkType

      private Map<DrinkType,Integer> getNumberOfDrinksByDrinkType()
      Counts the number of drinks that the client has and maps to DrinkType.
      Returns:
      Number of drinks mapped by invalid input: ''

    • getMessageBodyForOrderComplete

      private String getMessageBodyForOrderComplete(Map<DrinkType,Integer> numberOfDrinksByDrinkType)
      Creates and returns the text (using a StringBuilder) for a message body for an ORDER_COMPLETE Message, using the numberOfDrinksByDrinkType map.
      Parameters:
      numberOfDrinksByDrinkType - Map that contains the number of drinks mapped by DrinkType
      Returns:
      the text for the body of the ORDER_COMPLETE Message
